full_summary:
****Government Tender Announcement****

**Project Title:**

Police Patch, Reflective, Large and Small

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030842

**Publication Date:** 24 March 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** 6 April 2023, 14:00:00 EST

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of reflective police patches. The proposed procurement will occur in two phases. Phase 1 requires interested bidders to submit an expression of interest in the form of a submission of interest form. This form can be obtained from the contact information below and must be sent via email to the Contracting Authority by the tender closing date.

**Phase 1: Submission of Interest**

To participate in this requirement, interested bidders must complete the submission of interest form and send it via email to Carla Schonauer, Procurement Officer, at carla.schonauer@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The completed submission of interest form sent via email to the Contracting Authority will be accepted as the only means of expressing interest in the requirement. Any other means of expression of interest will not be considered.

**Phase 2: Request for Proposal**

Interested bidders who have submitted a duly completed submission of interest form will receive a copy of the Request for Proposal, specifications, and any other associated documentation in Phase 2. The Contracting Authority will send the solicitation package directly to the interested bidders by email after the tender closing date.

**Selection Criteria**

A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract (1 contract only).

**Additional Information**

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in the solicitation package.

**Contact Information**

For more information regarding this Proposed Procurement, including requests for clarification, please contact Carla Schonauer, Procurement Officer, at:

* Email: carla.schonauer@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-571-8780

Note to Reviewers:

* The tender is open to bidders who meet the eligibility criteria.
* The RCMP is committed to providing opportunities for Indigenous businesses.
